title: Club
body: I was in three clubs, and when i left a club today.I can't join a third club today.I see it unfair if others are in 3rd clubs and not me can LoL fix this problem?

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it looks like you're in 3 clubs. Are you still experiencing the issue?

I left third club, and i wanted to join another.Then, it told me.Sorry, you are already in a third club.And, i wasn't.But, when i logged back to LoL.I'm at the same club I'm at.Which is the third club that i left.Can say its a glitch.You know I like you guys, when i have a problem you guys respond back.Thanks for your amor.

No worries! :) 

So is everything fixed or are you unable to leave that third club so you can join another?
